content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize count() by Severity
content.title: Incidents by Severity (24h)

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize Incidents=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Incidents over time (last 24h)

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| where OperationNameValue has "delete"
| summarize Deletes=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: AzureActivity – Delete operations (24h)

content.query:
let APTs = (_GetWatchlist('osint_apt_watchlist') | project SearchKey);
AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| where tostring(Caller) in~ (APTs)
| project TimeGenerated, Caller, OperationNameValue, ResourceGroup
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Watchlist matches (APTs) in AzureActivity (24h)
